Shop Hatch Good Hatch My Design

How Does Hatch Work?

1
We first collaborate with our designers to insure quality and timely distribution of the product.
2
Once the product passes quality control, it becomes available on the designer's page to begin filling the first batch of order.
3
Our community of design enthusiasts join to hatch the product. However, if the required number of orders are not met for that batch, the product cannot be hatched.*
4
When the required number of orders are met for the first batch, the next batch opens up for orders while our designers begin manufacturing and shipping the first batch of orders.
